description: More improvements to the chorus chords, including double-timing them, which sounds more accurate.
title: Fight Music For The Fight

description:
Overhauled drum part.
Corrected bass part (wrong bend timing, wrong notes in chorus, missing chorus end, missing variations/flourishes, etc.)
Optimized bass part fingering with open strings.
Corrected "prechorus" chord, third chorus chord, and last chorus chord on guitar. (Note: fingerings may be odd. I am a bassist and a drummer.)
Adjusted guitar rhythm to match corrected bass part.
title: Fight Music For The Fight
